GSD.product_version: versions from v4.6 to before v4.14.300
GSD.description:
kcm: avoid potential race in kcm_tx_work

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.300 by commit 381b6cb3f3e66b84db77028ac7d84f18d80f1153, it was introduced in version v4.6 by commit ab7ac4eb9832e32a09f4e8042705484d2fb0aad3. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: kcm: avoid potential race in kcm_tx_work
